events.message: I received the wrong item and I want to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I ordered.
Case categorized under Refund based on customer request for money back due to receiving incorrect item.
The case is assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 456789123 and here is the photo showing the item I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days and you can keep the incorrect item as an apology for the inconvenience.
Thanks for the quick response and for letting me keep the item. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please allow up to 5 business days for the payment to reflect in your account.
We are following up to ensure that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case resolution.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
